verses.name: Amos 8:12
verses.text: And they shall wander from sea to sea, and from the north even to the east, they shall run to and fro to seek the word of the Lord, and shall not find it.

verses.name: Amos 8:13
verses.text: In that day shall the fair virgins and young men faint for thirst.

verses.name: Amos 8:14
verses.text: They that swear by the sin of Samaria, and say, Thy god, O Dan, liveth; and, The manner of Beer–sheba liveth; even they shall fall, and never rise up again.
